title: Tasty Chicken Scallopini  ( Seared Chicken With Lemon Butter Pasta ) Recipe
content:
Super delicious chicken scallopini which tastes so yummy. This seared chicken tastes amazing with lemon butter spaghetti. So good.

 

Chicken Scallopini Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Italian

Serves: 1 serving

 

Ingredients

Spaghetti - 100 grams

Chicken Breast - 1

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - ¼ cup

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Oil - 2 tablespoons

Butter - 3 tablespoons

Garlic - 4 cloves chopped finely

Lemon Juice - 2 tablespoons

Chicken stock or water - ½ cup

Cream or Milk - ½ cup

Coriander leaves as needed

 

Instructions

Cook pasta as per package directions and set aside.

Mix flour with salt and pepper and mix well.

Take chicken and coat in flour. Heat oil in a pan, fry chicken on both sides till golden. Drain and set aside.

In the same pan, add butter, garlic and fry for a min.

Add in lemon juice and chicken stock and mix well.

Add in salt and mix well.

Place chicken back in and cook for 3 to 4 mins.

Now remove the chicken and turn off the heat.

Let the mix cool down.

Now add in cream and mix well.

Put it back on the heat, add in pasta and mix well.

Add coriander leaves and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty zafrani ( Saffron ) Chicken Pulao Recipe
recommendations.content:
This is a delicious zafrani chicken pulao which is super easy to make and taste amazing. It is great for any party.
Pulao or biryani comes handy when coming to lunch box recipes. This recipe goes perfect with some raita, I served it with onion raita. You can enjoy yourself with any raita

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
